com.ltsllc.miranda.cluster

Class Cluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ltsllc.miranda.Subsystem
      • com.ltsllc.miranda.Consumer
        • com.ltsllc.miranda.manager.Manager<Node,NodeElement>
          • com.ltsllc.miranda.cluster.Cluster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparer, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Cluster
extends Manager<Node,NodeElement>
    A logical grouping of .

    This class allows the rest of the system to treat a cluster like a single unit. For example the system can "tell" the cluster about a new message and let the class worry about distributing it.

    Created by Clark on 12/31/2016.
